title: Infinite Blade
description:
Lulu (Lucius Lucent) is a cold blooded female warrior that makes men in battlefields quiver in fear. Along with her magical armor, Gil, she destroys everything in her path with her overwhelming power… A dark fantasy with an epic setting and a speedy storyline! (From:  Akibahara Channel)

[b]Warning:[/b] Contains scenes of violence and gore.
